name: 8 Trigrams Palms Rotation
effect:
Requirements: "Neji Hyuga" or "Byakugan" + "Main Branch"
Target: User
Effect: The target cannot receive any Damage during this turn.

name: A-Ranked Mission
effect:
Permanent
Target: 1 of your Ninjas
Effect: Attach this card to the target. If the target wins a Victory or an Outstanding Victory, win 1 Battle Reward.
"It's the first A-ranked mission since the one in the Land of Waves!!"

name: Abduction
effect:
Target: 1 of your opponent's "Genin" or lower Rank Ninjas
Effect: Move the target to your Village unless you already have a Ninja with the same name as the target. If the target is still in play, return it to your opponent's Village at the end of the turn.
"One night ... Lady Hinata was nearly abducted by an unknown enemy."

name: Aftereffects
effect:
Permanent
Target: 1 injured Ninja
Effect: Attach this card to the target. The target cannot be healed. (If you attach this card to your opponent's Ninja, they control this card.)
"You haven't recovered from the damage from the match ...!"

name: Ami
effect:
Leaf | Ninja Academy Student | Female
Effect: When this Client is put in play while you have 2 or more "Female" Ninjas or Clients in your Village, you can look at all the cards in your opponent's hand to search for 1 Jutsu or Mission card and discard it.
"Don't get so full of yourself!"

name: Another Tracker
effect: Effect: Move 1 "Jonin" Ninja in your hand to your Village.
"I've finally caught up with you ..."

name: Aoba Yamashiro
effect: Leaf | Special Jonin | Male
"It seems that one used the Genjutsu ..."

name: Armed Puppet
effect:
Requirements: "Puppet"
Target: 1 Ninja Battling against the user

name: Asuma Sarutobi
effect:
Leaf | Jonin | Male

When this Ninja is put in play, discard every in-play "Sound" Ninja with an Entrance cost of 2 or less.
"Good job, Shikamaru ..."

name: Ayame
effect:
Land of Fire | Female
Effect: At the beginning of your turn, you can return a "Ichiraku Noodle Shop" Mission card in your Discard Pile to its original owner's Deck. Then, shuffle the Deck.
"Thank you. Have a nice day!"

name: Basic Platoon
effect: Effect: Search for 1 "Platoon" Ninja in your Deck, show it to your opponent and place it in your hand. Then, shuffle your Deck.
"If you act in a team of more than 4, which exceeds the size of the basic platoon, you lose speed and cannot hide well ..."

name: Best Rival
effect:
Permanent (2)
Effect: When a Team with both "Kakashi Hatake" and "Might Guy" is sent out to Battle and opposed, that Team wins an Outstanding Victory in the Showdown regardless of the result of the Battle.
"That's my rival!"

name: Caged Bird
effect:
Counter Permanent (2)
Target: 1 Ninja
Effect: Attach this card to the target. The target cannot be sent out to Battle. (If you attach this card to your opponent's Ninja, they control this card.)
"It's a symbol of the one who is bound by an inescapable fate!"

name: Changes in Pairings
effect:
Target: 1 of your opponent's Ninjas
Effect: The target's Team cannot be sent out to Battle during this turn.
"There have been some changes in the tournament."

name: Chidori
effect:
Requirements: "Sasuke Uchiha" or "Kakashi Hatake"
Target: User
Effect: The target gets +5/+0 during this turn. Also, if the target's Team wins a Victory or an Outstanding Victory, give 1 additional Damage to every Ninja Battling against the target when Damage is applied.

name: Choza Akimichi
effect:
Leaf | Jonin | Male
[REUNION OF THE TRIO]
Valid: This Ninja gets +1/+1 when it is in the same Team as a "Jonin" Ninja with a "Mind" Combat Attribute and another "Jonin" Ninja with a "Shadow" Combat Attribute.

name: Clone Body Slamming
effect:
Requirements: "Clone status"
Target: User
Effect: The target gets +2/+0 during this turn. Then, flip a Ninja Blade coin until you get tails. The target gets an additional +2/+0 during this turn for every heads you get during the flips.

name: Collapse of the Hidden Leaf Village
effect:
Permanent (3)
Effect: Every in-play "Leaf" Ninja gets -1/-1.

name: Combo of 16 Hits
effect: Effect: If any Ninja in your Team(s) uses 3 or more Jutsu cards during this turn, that Ninja's Team wins an Outstanding Victory in the Showdown regardless of the result of the Battle.
"Shikamaruuu! Knock her down with a combo of 16 hits!!!"

name: Crow
effect:
Puppet
[TACTICAL PUPPET]
Valid: This Ninja can only be sent out to Battle in the same Team as a Ninja with a "Manipulation" Combat Attribute. When this Ninja is put in play, place a Ninja Blade coin symbolizing +1/+1 on it.
"Creak"

name: Dead Soul Jutsu
effect:

Counter

Permanent (2)

effect:

Sound | Female | Sound Four
[IMPENETRABLE BARRIER]
You can organize a Team of 4 Ninjas with other "The Four Sound Ninja" Ninjas including this Ninja. While this Ninja is sent out to Attack in this Team, none of your Ninjas can be the target of your opponent's Jutsu cards.
"You all smell sweaty!"

name: Temari
effect:
Sand | Genin | Female | Mental Power: 1
[ANALYTICAL MIND]
While this Ninja is sent out to Battle and opposed, it gets +0/+X during the turn. X = the value of this Ninja's Mental Power.
"But ... now I know how the Jutsu works!"

name: Teuchi
effect:
Land of Fire | Male
Effect: If you play the "Ichiraku Noodle Shop" Mission card, you can heal 1 additional Ninja.
"Here you go."

name: The End of the Mortal Combat
effect: Effect: Each player must discard their in-play Ninja with the highest Entrance cost. (If a player has 2 or more Ninjas that have the highest Entrance cost, that player selects and discards 1 of them.)
"Why didn't you ... dodge my attack ...?"

name: The Final Competition Begins
effect: Effect: Your opponent can organize their Teams. Only "Genin" Ninjas can be sent out to Battle during this turn.
"You're gonna be the heroes of this official exam!"

name: The First Hokage
effect:
Leaf | Satoosa | Male | Metal Power: 2
[THE HOKAGE LEVEL]
Valid: When this Ninja becomes the user of a Jutsu card with the "Earth" symbol, reduce 1 "Earth" in its Jutsu cost if there is one.
"It's been a long time, Sarutobi ..."

name: The Name "Gaara"
effect:
Target: (1) Your "Gaara of the Desert"
             (2) X number of your in-play Ninjas
Effect: Discard target (2) to place X number of Ninja Blade coin(s) symbolizing +1/+1 on target (1).
"Love only yourself, and fight only for yourself."

name: The Nine-Tailed Fox Spirit
effect:
Fox Spirit | Animal
[OLD DISASTER]
When this Ninja is put in play, your opponent wins 2 Battle Rewards.
"Come closer ... kid ..."

name: The One Who Inherits and Entrusts the Will
effect: Effect: If all your in-play Ninjas are "Leaf" Ninjas, draw until you have 6 cards in your hand.
"I am the Third Hokage, the man who inherited the will of the Hidden Leaf Village from the First and Second Hokages!!!"

name: The Second Hokage
effect:
Leaf | Satoosa | Male | Metal Power: 2
[THE HOKAGE LEVEL]
Valid: When this Ninja becomes the user of a Jutsu card with the "Water" symbol, reduce 1 "Water" in its Jutsu cost if there is one.
"You've grown old, Sarutobi ..."

name: The Third Hokage
effect:
Leaf | Satoosa | Male | Mental Power: 3
[ADDRESSING PAST WRONGS]
You can move 1 Ninja Battling against this Ninja to the bottom of its original owner's Deck. In that case, discard this Ninja at the end of this turn.
"I'll destroy you to correct my old mistake!!"

name: Water Style: Water Shock Wave
effect:
Requirements: "The Second Hokage"
Target: Every Ninja Battling against the user
Effect: The target becomes a Stand-By Ninja. However, if the target includes a "Satoosa" or "Sannin" or higher Rank Ninja, this effect is negated.
"Water Style: Water Shock Wave!"

name: Water Style: Water Wall
effect:
Target: Each of your Ninjas
Effect: The target cannot be the taret of your opponent's Jutsu cards with the "Fire" symbol during this turn.
"He can activate such an advanced Water-Style technique where there's no water!"

name: Wind Scythe Jutsu
effect:
Requirements: "Temari"
Target: 1 Ninja Battling against the user
Effect: If the target is the only Ninja in its Team, the target becomes a Stand-By Ninja.
"Yes, ... it was this attack that made all my weapons totally powerless ..."

name: You Got Me!
effect:
Counter
Target: 1 of your Ninjas
Effect: If the target's Team wins a Victory or an Outstanding Victory during this turn, negate all Damage it gives in the Showdown. Then, place 1 growth coin on the target.
"You got me ... I give up!"
